summary: Cute anime fantasy like eyes ( Not lore friendly)
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff7700][size=6][u][b]ABOUT:[/b][/u][/size][/color]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/DHCpmWV.png[/img]

[u][color=#f4cccc]
* Report any issue or if items are missing , this is my first standalone eye mod* [/color][/u]

These eyes are not lore friendly and isnt meant to be, the are my tribute to my Dear who love Skyrim.
I share this for all who is open to Non-lore friendly mods.[/center]


[u][size=3]Installation:[/size][/u] Use a Mod Manager or...

Manual Installation:
Copy and paste the contents of the .ZIP into your Skyrim Data folder.[size=2][b]

---------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/b][/size]
Go to for ecample : C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\Textures\actors\character\eyes

Remove folder called : [i]"Eyes of Faye"[/i]

[u][size=4][b]BUGS[/b]:[/size]
[/u]==============================================================================

[b]*Eyes shows up on male and looks, odd? But can be fixed with racemenu. Will make seperate make eyes. [/b]
Follow this fix:

[b]-If you have nexus mod manage[/b]: Deactivate the other eye mod, start game and make a clean save ,
Remove my mod, and re-download it [i]( unless you have the zip, re-add it then)[/i]

*If you can't download, I don't know why. Nexus has issues?

*Any other bugs or CTDÂ  maybe is caused by other mods, mine is just a eye textures.


[i](English is not my first language,)[/i]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4]PERMISSION :[/size][/color]

[size=2]You are free to edit, re-upload, convert, use any part of this mod so no need to ask.
IF YOU UPLOAD IT TO STEAM, CREDIT ME! [/size]
author: MassiveMaster
